scripts.install_all: npm run clean && npm install && bower install && npm run remove_default_fancytree && npm run install_dev_fancytree
scripts.install_dev_fancytree: cd node_modules/ && mkdir jquery.fancytree && cd jquery.fancytree && git clone https://github.com/mar10/fancytree.git --branch v2.26.0 && mv fancytree/* .
